member.name: T:WebFormsDocumentViewer.Converters.ExcelToHtmlConverter
member.summary: Helper class to convert Excel documents to HTML
member.remarks: You should also have Microsoft Office installed on the server for this to work

member.name: M:WebFormsDocumentViewer.Converters.ExcelToHtmlConverter.Convert(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Converts the Excel document to HTML
member.param: Directory where the HTML file will be saved

member.name: T:WebFormsDocumentViewer.Converters.MailToHtmlConverter
member.summary: Helper class to convert Mail files to HTML
member.remarks: You should also have Microsoft Office installed on the server for this to work

member.name: M:WebFormsDocumentViewer.Converters.MailToHtmlConverter.Convert(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Converts the Mail file to HTML
member.param: Directory where the HTML file will be saved

member.name: T:WebFormsDocumentViewer.Converters.RtfToPdfConverter
member.summary: Helper class to convert RichTextFormat documents to PDF. For now this does exactly what the Word converter does, but there might be some differences, that's why they are separated
member.remarks: You should also have Microsoft Office installed on the server for this to work

member.name: M:WebFormsDocumentViewer.Converters.RtfToPdfConverter.Convert(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Converts the RichTextFormat document to PDF
member.param: Directory where the PDF file will be saved

member.name: T:WebFormsDocumentViewer.Converters.PowerPointToPdfConverter
member.summary: Helper class to convert PowerPoint documents to PDF
member.remarks: You should also have Microsoft Office installed on the server for this to work

member.name: M:WebFormsDocumentViewer.Converters.PowerPointToPdfConverter.Convert(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Converts the PowerPoint document to PDF
member.param: Directory where the PDF file will be saved

member.name: T:WebFormsDocumentViewer.Converters.WordToPdfConverter
member.summary: Helper class to convert Word documents to PDF
member.remarks: You should also have Microsoft Office installed on the server for this to work

member.summary: Converts the Word document to PDF
